dc_title_s: L'Ancien monde et le nouveau: en deux hemispheres; par M. Bonne, ingenieur hydrogr.phe de la Marine.
dc_description_s: In upper left: Livre I. et les suivants. In upper right: No. 1. From his Atlas de toutes les parties connues du globe terrestre. cf. Library of Congress. Map Division. A list of geographical atlases, 652, no. 1. 1 map: hand col.; 2 hemispheres each 20 cm. in diam., on sheet 22 x 41 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
